query: 男子，留着黑色短发，穿着卡其色裤子和灰色连衣帽，肩上背着黑色背包。
The man has short, dark hair and wears khaki pants with an oversized grey hoodie. His black backpack hangs from one shoulder.
A man wearing a gray, hooded jacket, a pair of wrinkled brown pants, a gray backpack and a pair of dark colored shoes.

query_dynamic: 男士，穿着黄色运动衫，深色裤子和白色运动鞋，走在室内，姿势随意。
The person wears a yellow oversized sweatshirt, dark pants, and white sneakers, walking indoors with a casual posture.
A casually dressed individual is seen walking indoors, wearing a loose yellow sweatshirt with dark pants and white sneakers. Their posture is relaxed, and their arms swing naturally.

The person in the image is wearing an oversized yellow sweatshirt with dark-colored pants and white sneakers. They appear to be walking at a steady pace, with a slightly relaxed posture and arms swinging gently. The indoor setting suggests a casual and comfortable movement.
